item.description:
We last visited Riva in August of 2010, when we went there for dinner. But Riva is intriguing in that they also offer a brunch menu on Sunday, from 8:00 - 2:00. This is something that few other South Shore restaurants do, and trying Riva's brunch has been on Mike's To-Do list for a long time.

In case you're wondering, we did confirm that Riva is open, despite its location on the recently storm-lashed Scituate waterfront. Mike hopes that you'll join him there this Sunday at 11:30, because the only thing better than pancakes on a Sunday morning... is having friends around the table with you.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Riva Restaurant
Sunday, February 17th, 2013 @ 11:30 AM 
116 Front St. 
Scituate, MA
(781) 545-5881
Website: Riva Restaurant
What they're saying on Yelp

Organizer: Mike

Min/Max: None at this time.

Guests: Yes. Up to two per member.

Price Range: The brunch menu is unfortunately not online, but it is a menu, rather than a buffet, featuring brunch and breakfast favorites like eggs Benedict, omelets and pancakes. There should be something here to fit every appetite and budget, but do keep in mind that Riva is not a typical "breakfast and lunch" place but one of the better restaurants on the South Shore.

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over six years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

Event Fee: No Event Fee for current Annual Members. Other Members and Guests: $2.00

RSVP Deadline: Saturday, February 16th at 12:00 PM.
